description: Wireless logging N.B. This probably won't work on Android 4.1+. Simple tool for android development that sends a log to UDP port or share it via email, bluetooth, etc. Background service is collecting logs and sending them to destination IP and UDP port. You can send logs to desktop computer through home wifi network, or to server with public IP or cname. To listen logs use this python script: https://github.com/Chemik/logcatudp/blob/master/test/listener.py Example: ./listener.py 192.168.1.10 10009 You can also use your desktop syslog server to receive logs.
